example.text: House Republicans’ bill to raise the debt ceiling cuts 60,000 teachers, hurting 25 million kids. It cuts 30 million veterans' health visits and increases the disability claims backlog by 130,000. We need a solution to help Americans?—not hurt them.

Allowing a default would erase millions of jobs, trigger a recession, devastate retirement accounts, and increase borrowing costs. I am committed to a bipartisan solution to pass a clean debt ceiling bill and prevent this nightmare.

I have represented Illinois's 5th district since 2009. In that time, I've seen what our community truly needs to become a better place to live. That's why I've requested over $22 million to fund projects in our district that will do just that.
He is a fraud and his constituents deserve better. [[url]]

I just worked with [[user]] to introduce a resolution recognizing May as Brain Tumor Awareness Month. Brain tumors have impacted too many lives for too long. It's time to raise awareness and cure brain tumors once and for all.

This aid has been critical to Ukraine's success in this war. I will continue to be a vocal supporter of providing Ukraine what they need to keep fighting, ultimately bring this war to an end, and hold Putin accountable for his crimes.

The GOP's Child Deportation Act is not a comprehensive solution to our immigration crisis. It provides zero additional resources for CBP officers at ports of entry and creates even more bottlenecks. We must secure our border—but this is not the answer.
